name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel I to IV & Trails into Reverie Complete Box - Limited Edition
summary: At Thors Military Academy, Erebonia’s best and brightest learn everything from the art of war to the liberal arts. First-year Rean Schwarzer learns that he's been selected as a member of Class VII, which controversially includes both nobles and commoners. But they’ll need to deal with more than just class warfare - they’ll need to safeguard their country from those who would plunge it into chaos.
